description: NeoQA-style SYNTHETIC NEWS CORPUS for External Retrieval (L4). Contains fictional news articles about fictional entities that CANNOT be in any LLM's training data. This is NOT live web search - it's controlled external corpus retrieval for reproducibility and verifiability.
methodology: External Retrieval differs from RAG: RAG (L3) uses internal knowledge base (policies, manuals), while External (L4) retrieves from external news/facts corpus (news articles, public announcements). Both are corpus retrieval, but test different skills and content types.

facts.article: Zephyrix Technologies Inc. (NASDAQ: ZPHY) announced Q4 2025 earnings of $4.73 billion, exceeding analyst expectations by 12%. CEO Maria Thornwell attributed the growth to strong demand for their quantum computing modules.
